title: Prospectus for growth
creator_contributor_role: United States Information Service, production company
subject_group: Agriculture, Business, Commerce & Industry/Agriculture - Economic aspects
Agriculture, Business, Commerce & Industry/Agriculture - Developing countries
Economics, Philosophy, Politics, Religion & Sociology/Agriculture - Economic aspects
Economics, Philosophy, Politics, Religion & Sociology/Economic assistance
description: Demonstrates how the investment of foreign capital contributes to the economic development of traditionally agricultural countries by promoting the growth and diversification of industry. It shows how capital investment from the United States has made possible improvemnets in the standard of living in Latin America, the Near East and Far East.
